examples.example: 我今天买了一公升新鲜的牛奶，准备好好享受营养美味。

translate.english: I bought one liter of fresh milk today and am going to enjoy the nutritious and delicious.

examples.example: 我每天坚持喝一公升的水，让自己保持健康活力。

translate.english: I insist on drinking one liter of water every day to keep myself healthy and energetic.

examples.example: 我给植物浇了一公升的水，期望它能茁壮成长。

translate.english: I watered the plant with one liter of water, expecting it to thrive.
